resources.string: So who made this thing, anyway?

Austin Free-Net provides technology training and access for the community, fostering skills that enable people to succeed in a digital age. Our computer labs and classes are open to all; our focus is on under served communities. The knowledge we offer helps people obtain jobs, improve their lives, and participate as active citizens.\n\n Austin Free-Net, is a 501(c)(3) a nonprofit organization that has been working to bridge the Digital Divide in the Austin area since 1995.
